addGuardian(address).details: Restricted, can only be called by address(this).

addRecoveryOwner(address).details: Restricted, can only be called by address(this).

params.newRecoveryOwner: Address of the new recovery owner.

changeOwner(address).details: Restricted, can only be called by address(this).

changeSingleton(address).details: Restricted, can only be called by address(this).

constructor.details: Sets the owner of the implementation address (singleton) to 'this'.      This will make the base contract unusable, even though it does not have 'delegatecall'.

params.signatures: Signatures of the hash of the transaction.

returns.configTimestamp: Time when the recover was triggered. _isLocked        Boolean if the wallet is currently locked.

returns._0: Array of guardians for this wallet.
Array of recovery owners for this wallet.

params.ownerSignature: Signature of the owner that validates the correctness of the address.

params.hash: Hash of the data to be signed.
params.signature: Signature byte array associated with hash. MUST return the bytes4 magic value 0x1626ba7e when function passes. MUST NOT modify state (using STATICCALL for solc < 0.5, view modifier for solc > 0.5) MUST allow external calls

recover(address).details: Restricted, can only be called by address(this).

params.callData: Data payload, can only be either lock(), unlock() or recover(address).
params.signatures: Signatures of the hash of the transaction.

removeGuardian(address,address).details: Restricted, can only be called by address(this).

params.guardianToRemove: Address of the guardian to be removed.
params.prevGuardian: Address of the previous guardian in the linked list.

removeRecoveryOwner(address,address).details: Restricted, can only be called by address(this).

params.prevRecoveryOwner: Address of the previous recovery owner in the linked list.
params.recoveryOwnerToRemove: Address of the recovery owner to be removed.

unlock().details: Restricted, can only be called by address(this).

addGuardian(address).notice: Adds a new guardian. Can only be called by the owner + recovery owner         or owner + guardian.

addRecoveryOwner(address).notice: Adds a new recovery owner. Can only be called by the owner + recovery owner         or owner + guardian.

changeOwner(address).notice: Changes the owner of the wallet. Can only be called by the owner + recovery owner         or owner + guardian.

changeSingleton(address).notice: Changes the singleton. Can only be called by the owner + recovery owner         or owner + guardian.

exec(address,uint256,bytes,uint256,bytes.notice: Executes a generic transaction.         The transaction is required to be signed by the owner + recovery owner or owner + guardian         while the wallet is not locked.

init(address,address[],address[],bytes).notice: Setup function, sets initial storage of the wallet.         It can't be called after initialization.

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: Should return whether the signature provided is valid for the provided hash.

operationHash(address,uint256,bytes,uint.notice: Returns the hash to be signed to execute a transaction.

recover(address).notice: Recovers the wallet. Can only be called by the recovery owner + recovery owner         or recovery owner + guardian.

removeGuardian(address,address).notice: Removes a guardian. Can only be called by the owner + recovery owner         or owner + guardian.

removeRecoveryOwner(address,address).notice: Removes a recovery owner. Can only be called by the owner + recovery owner         or owner + guardian.

unlock().notice: Unlocks the wallet. Can only be called by the owner + recovery owner         or owner + guardian.

userdoc.notice: Laser is a secure smart contract wallet (vault) made for the Ethereum Virtual Machine.
